description.value:
The Carefully cooked Progenoid Glands of a captured Loyalist Space Marine, glazed in rare oils and roasted within their dying presence. Insulting even to Chaos Space Marines but apparently quite delicious. Quences a hearty appetite, grants Regeneration(4) Trait for 1d10 Rounds.

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
